description: This is sub container information for Anatomic Pathology specimens.

columns.name: SPECIMEN_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the specimen record

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the sub container information for anatomic pathology (AP) specimens. Together with SPECIMEN_ID, this forms the foreign key for this table, SPEC_TASK_LIST.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of specific sub container information for anatomic pathology (AP) specimens associated with the different tasks on the specimen from the SPEC_TASK_LIST table.

columns.name: TASK_LINKED_SCTR_ID
columns.description: Stores a container designation that may be created in association with a specific container and task, as in a slide for a given block designation with a specific stain.
